string.value: I found it! I found Bob again! He must have escaped from The Rememberer by himself! I feel really terrible that I let this kind of things happen. I am going back to The Rememberer to tell him to lighten up.

I don't think The Rememberer gets the whole idea of me doing this. Bob may be just another monster but I know what is right or wrong. And I am going to pay back just the way he did to me. I need to get 1 #b#t4000019##k other than Bob's to pull this off.
I got him! The Remeberer will always remember this day. The day he got tricked by me! Ok. I should stop doing things like this though.
... oh. You are back to me with Bob again...
I've been looking for him. Bob magically disappeared from my collection set of monsters...
... I guess you don't want to talk to me about Bob anymore...
If you are still interested, I'll give you reward for handing Bob back to me... \r\n\r\n#L0##b Huh. really...#k#l

I did give you the reward last time I got Bob's snail shell from you, didn't I?

#L0##bI guess so. Here, take him.#k#l
#L1##bI'm not falling for that again!#k#l
Thank you. Let me look up what I can give you.
I guess you've come around. Sorry for last time. Monsters are there to be hunted, not to be protected, you know... Wait... this doesn't seem right. How come this #bsnail shell#k looks so... clean?
Hey! You thief! You switched Bob's snail shell with just another snail shell, didn't you?!\r\n\r\n#b(Good time to run, I think)#k
I don't think you have what I need...
